text: Incarnation is a religious belief. It explains how a spiritual being may become a body (incarnates). Examples of incarnations in various religions include: * Leimarel Sidabi, of Sanamahism * Krishna, of Hinduism * Buddha, of Buddhism * Jesus, of Christianity * Guan Yin, of Buddhism * Kali, of Hinduism * Durga, of Hinduism * Parvati, of Hinduism Category:Theology
title: Incarnation
